fields.name: Mission statement
fields.value: To understand the 20th century, its people, its history, politics and art, through its books.

fields.name: NB
fields.value: Although some people and events of the century present themselves to us through books, they are real people and real events. We must not forget to treat them as such. This applies in particular to those who have suffered systemic oppression.

fields.name: My Family and Other Animals
fields.value: So we sold the house and fled from the gloom of the English summer, like a flock of migrating swallows.
